text: Abdul Aziz bin Fahd (; born 16 April 1973) was a Saudi prince and member of the royal House of Saud.Saudi prince Abdul Aziz bin Fahd dies at 44 His father was King Fahd. He was first appointed as minister of state without portfolio in May 1998. Then, he was made head of the Office of the Council of Ministers in January 2000, when he was 28 years old. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi princes and princesses Category:Civil servants Category:Saudi Arabian businesspeople Category:King Saud University alumni
title: Abdul Aziz bin Fahd
